ch0282_00_ballguy_salon/8201_2001_01_10:
If you have any questions about Poké Balls,
you can count on me—the Ball Guy!
ch0282_00_ballguy_salon/8201_2002_01_10:
Hey there! Thanks for rolling by to have a
chat with your mate—the Ball Guy!
ch0282_00_ballguy_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
My friendship with you is rolling along like a
Master Ball, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0282_00_ballguy_salon/8201_2101_01_10:
Here’s a present I hope you’ll find
agreea-ball!
ch0282_00_ballguy_salon/8201_2101_02_10: I’ll always be cheering for you!
ch0282_00_ballguy_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
I have an INCREDIBALL gift for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0282_00_ballguy_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
Giving presents sure can be tricky, don’t
you think?
ch0282_00_ballguy_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
I think you’ll have a ball with this,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0282_00_ballguy_salon/8201_2103_02_10: That present’s a sym-ball of our friendship!
ch0282_00_ballguy_salon/8201_2103_03_10:
I’ll keep cheering you on to keep you on
the ball!
ch0282_00_ballguy_salon/8201_2201_01_10: Did you want to talk to me, the Ball Guy?
ch0282_00_ballguy_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
Chatting a lot is just like using a Friend Ball!
We’ll be friends in no time!
ch0282_00_ballguy_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
We get along so well! I’ve so much to talk
to you about, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0282_00_ballguy_salon/8201_2302_01_10:
Oh, a present for me?! Thank you so much!
I’ll treasure this!
ch0282_00_ballguy_salon/8201_2301_01_10:
Wow! Are you sure you want to give me
such a lova-ball gift?!
ch0282_00_ballguy_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
Let me offer my ultra-great thanks! I’ll be
sure to put this in my collection case as a
favorite!
ch0282_00_ballguy_salon/8201_2402_01_10:
Time just rolled right by, huh! Let’s have a
nice, long chat next time!
ch0282_00_ballguy_salon/8201_2401_01_10:
My chats with you are just full of surprises,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0282_00_ballguy_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
I’m so glad we got to learn more about
each other! Let’s chat again sometime!
ch0282_00_ballguy_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
If I had to describe it...I’d say it’s as relaxing
as a Luxury Ball!
ch0282_00_ballguy_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
I’ve got a long road ahead to becoming an
official mascot...
ch0282_00_ballguy_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
But I’ll keep doing my best! No matter how
tough it gets, I’ll get the job done!
ch0282_00_ballguy_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
Feel free to share with everyone how
dependa-ball I am!
ch0282_00_ballguy_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
You might become the most popular person
on Pasio!
ch0282_00_ballguy_salon/8003_0701_02_10: I can’t lose to you! I have to get better!
ch0282_00_ballguy_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
Let’s learn from each other and keep aiming
for greater heights!
